title: The 11 Most Comfortable Mary Jane Shoes You’ll Wear on Repeat
description: Never compromise style for comfort with these.
excerpt: From arch supportive insoles, to a cushioned footbed, and simple soft leathers, this selection of mary jane shoes are the most comfortable ones on the market.
text: Easiest to Put On Coach Angelina Mary JaneNever struggle to get your shoes on again. This pair snaps on and off, so you don’t have to fidget with the straps or pull to get them on. html:
Easiest to Put On

Coach Angelina Mary Jane

Never struggle to get your shoes on again. This pair snaps on and off, so you don’t have to fidget with the straps or pull to get them on.

Colors: Black, White, Red

Sizes: 5-11

Material: Patent leather upper, man-made leather lining, leather footbed, rubber outsole

Customer review: “Lovely shoes! Very nice style but also very comfortable too.Look great with trousers or dresses.”

Best Metalic Mary Jane

Larroude Blair Block Pump

At first glance, these Larroude shoes might not seem exceptionally comfortable, but they truly are. The leather molds to your feet as you wear them and requires virtually no break-in period, allowing you to don them straight out of the box.

Colors: Black, Silver, Ivory

Sizes: 5-11

Material: Mirror Synthetic

Customer review: “I already had these in silver, so I had to get them in black too. You can walk in these all day!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Most Comfortable Mary Jane High Heel

Sézane Georgia High Mary Jane

Add these polished camel-hued Mary Jane high heels to your wardrobe for a stylish yet comfortable option. The strap keeps your foot secure, while the platform under the ball of the foot provides extra cushioning, making them comfortable to wear all day.

Colors: Camel, Black, Red, Beige

Sizes: 5-11

Material: Patent goatskin leather, sheep leather, rubber

Best Subtle Square Toe

Dolce Vita Reyes Stud Ballet Flat

Crafted from sleek black leather and adorned with gold-tone studs, these flats make a statement while remaining versatile enough for everyday wear. Designed with comfort in mind, they feature a cushioned footbed and durable sole, perfect for all-day styling. Whether paired with casual denim, tailored workwear, or a chic dress, the Reyes studded flats add a touch of sophistication and attitude to any outfit, making them an all-season wardrobe staple.

Colors: Black

Sizes: 6-11

Material: Leather

Customer review: “I am not usually a ballet flat girl but something about the square toe of these is really changing my mind. I absolutely love the fancy, delicate buckle, they are also surprisingly comfortable! I know they will break in beautifully.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Leopard Print Mary Jane

Kenneth Cole New York Jasper Mary Jane Ballet Flat

Incorporating a leopard-print Mary Jane into your shoe collection is an effortless way to elevate your everyday outfits. This bold yet versatile pattern adds a touch of personality to even the simplest ensembles into standout looks.

Colors: Leopard, Chocolate

Sizes: 5-9

Material: Suede; man-made lining, thermoplastic sole

Best Everyday Luxury

Christian Louboutin Miss Jane Patent Red Sole Pump

To start the new year on the right foot, I decided to splurge on a pair of Mary Janes, and I can safely say these were worth every penny. Not only do they look absolutely beautiful—no matter what I’m wearing—but I’ve walked down 30 blocks comfortably in them since the chunky block heel evenly distributes your weight.

Colors: Black, Leche

Sizes: 5-12

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Value Mary Jane

Charles Keith Yara Patent Mary Jane Flat

These cherry-red Mary Jane flats from Charles & Keith exude a luxe appeal that belies their price. For under $60, you get a design that looks and feels like it should cost three times as much.

Colors: Cream, Red, Black

Sizes: 5-11

Material: Natural PU

Best Luxury Mary Jane

Prada Patent Leather Mary Jane Pump

Renowned for its exceptional craftsmanship, Prada’s Mary Jane pumps are a stylish and versatile wardrobe essential. Offering a luxe update to the classic design, the perforated detailing adds a vintage-inspired twist.

Colors: Black

Sizes: 6-11

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Dainty Denim

Carel Kina Denim Mary Jane Ballerina Pump

Carel’s iconic shoes boast a rich history, embodying Parisian elegance since the brand’s inception in 1952 with the Mary Jane as one of its primary styles, so you know they stand the test of time. The Carel Mary Jane has been seen on It Girls around the world, like Alexa Chung, Em Rata, and Clara Luciana.

Colors: Light Blue

Sizes: 6-10

Material: Leather and denim

Most Sustainable Mary Jane

Reformation Angela Mary Jane Loafer

The demure Mary Jane gets a little edgy in this loafer version that boasts Reformation’s sustainable ethos, so you won’t just look good in these; you’ll feel good about them, too!

Colors: Black

Sizes: 5-11

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Ballet Flat Mary Jane

Birdies The Hummingbird Mary Jane

You’ll feel like you’re wearing slippers in these Mary Janes because that’s what the brand Birdies is famous for. Add a touch of nostalgia to your wardrobe with this black velvet shoe that blends the look and comfort of a ballet flat and the elegance of a traditional Mary Jane.

Colors: Black, Hot Pink

Sizes: 5-11

Material: Velvet with an anti-bacterial satin lining.

Customer review: “The shoes are so well made. Extremely comfortable and have a beautiful appearance.”

Why Trust ELLE Fashion

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.

Additional market by Vanessa Powell.
